description.zh-cn: 清朝光绪帝的妃嫔，他他拉氏，满洲镶红旗人。光绪帝最宠爱的妃子，因支持光绪帝的改革主张及卖官等事得罪慈禧太后。戊戌政变后被软禁，八国联军攻入北京时，被慈禧太后下令投井杀害。
description.en: A consort of the Guangxu Emperor of the Qing dynasty, from the Tatara clan and the Manchu Bordered Red Banner. She was the emperor's favorite consort but fell out of favor with Empress Dowager Cixi for supporting the emperor's reforms and for her involvement in selling official posts. She was placed under house arrest after the Wuxu Coup and was ordered to be drowned in a well by Cixi as the Eight-Nation Alliance forces entered Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第十一位皇帝，珍妃的丈夫，在位期间试图推行戊戌变法但被慈禧太后镇压。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Qing dynasty and the husband of Consort Zhen. During his reign, he attempted to implement the Wuxu Reform, but it was suppressed by Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期中国的实际统治者，光绪帝名义上的母亲，据传因珍妃支持光绪及干预朝政而下令将其杀害。
description.en: The de facto ruler of China in the late Qing dynasty and the nominal mother of the Guangxu Emperor. It is widely believed that she ordered the execution of Consort Zhen for supporting the emperor and meddling in court politics.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的妃嫔，珍妃的同胞姐姐。
description.en: A consort of the Guangxu Emperor and the biological elder sister of Consort Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的皇后，慈禧太后的侄女。与光绪帝关系不睦，不受宠爱。
description.en: The empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor and a niece of Empress Dowager Cixi. She had a poor relationship with the emperor and did not receive his favor.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃和瑾妃的父亲，曾任礼部侍郎。
description.en: The father of Consort Zhen and Consort Jin, who served as Vice Minister of Rites.

description.zh-cn: 清末太监，据传奉慈禧太后之命将珍妃投入井中。
description.en: A court eunuch in the late Qing dynasty, who allegedly threw Consort Zhen into a well under the order of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 1898年由慈禧太后发动的政变，结束了光绪帝推行的戊戌变法，导致光绪帝被软禁，珍妃也受牵连被囚禁。
description.en: A coup d'état in 1898 launched by Empress Dowager Cixi, which ended the Hundred Days' Reform initiated by the Guangxu Emperor. It resulted in the emperor's house arrest and the imprisonment of his supporter, Consort Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 1900年入侵中国的八国军事联盟，其攻占北京是珍妃被杀害的直接背景。
description.en: A multinational military coalition that invaded China in 1900. Their capture of Beijing served as the immediate backdrop for the murder of Consort Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员、学者，曾是珍妃的老师，因支持光绪帝而与李鸿章等人不和，后被革职。
description.en: A late Qing official and scholar who was once Consort Zhen's tutor. He was at odds with Li Hongzhang and others for his support of the Guangxu Emperor and was later dismissed from office.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，在甲午战争时对日持妥协态度，与主战派文廷式等人不和。
description.en: A prominent statesman in the late Qing dynasty who held a compromising attitude towards Japan during the First Sino-Japanese War, leading to conflicts with pro-war officials like Wen Tingshi.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，李鸿章心腹，受其授意向慈禧太后参奏，诬陷珍妃干政。
description.en: A late Qing official and a confidant of Li Hongzhang. At Li's instigation, he submitted a memorial to Empress Dowager Cixi, falsely accusing Consort Zhen of interfering in state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃的兄长，礼部侍郎。因珍妃案被贬谪至乌里雅苏台。
description.en: The elder brother of Consort Zhen and a Vice Minister of Rites. He was demoted and exiled to Uliastai due to his sister's case.

description.zh-cn: 据《国闻备乘》记载，他曾向珍妃行贿四万金，从而获得上海道一职。
description.en: According to 'Guowen Beicheng', he bribed Consort Zhen with 40,000 taels of gold to obtain the position of Shanghai Daotai.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝，由满族建立。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history, established by the Manchu people.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一，珍妃所属的旗籍。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty, to which Consort Zhen's clan belonged.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的生父，道光帝第七子。
description.en: The biological father of the Guangxu Emperor and the seventh son of the Daoguang Emperor.

en: Primary Consort of Prince Chun the Virtuous

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的生母，慈禧太后的胞妹。
description.en: The biological mother of the Guangxu Emperor and the younger sister of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃于1889年入宫成为光绪帝的嫔，后晋封为妃，是光绪帝最宠爱的妃子。
description.en: Consort Zhen entered the palace in 1889 as a concubine of the Guangxu Emperor, later promoted to Consort, and was his most favored consort.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后因珍妃支持光绪帝、卖官、生活西化等原因对其日益不满，曾于1894年对其施以“褫衣廷杖”重刑致其小产，并于戊戌政变后将其软禁。最终在1900年八国联军进京时下令将其投井杀害。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi grew increasingly displeased with Consort Zhen for supporting the Guangxu Emperor, selling official posts, and her Westernized lifestyle. In 1894, Cixi ordered a severe 'flogging by stripping', which caused her to miscarry. After the Wuxu Coup, she was placed under house arrest. Finally, as the Eight-Nation Alliance entered Beijing in 1900, Cixi ordered her to be thrown into a well and killed.

description.zh-cn: 据史料记载，太监崔玉贵奉慈禧太后之命，将珍妃推入井中杀害。
description.en: According to historical records, the eunuch Cui Yugui, under orders from Empress Dowager Cixi, pushed Consort Zhen into a well, causing her death.

description.zh-cn: 戊戌政变失败后，珍妃因被视为光绪帝的支持者而受到牵连，被慈禧太后下令软禁。
description.en: After the failure of the Wuxu Coup, Consort Zhen was implicated as a supporter of the Guangxu Emperor and was placed under house arrest by order of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃是瑾妃的同胞妹妹。
description.en: Consort Zhen was the biological younger sister of Consort Jin.

description.zh-cn: 志锐是珍妃的同胞兄长。
description.en: Zhirui was the biological elder brother of Consort Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 隆裕是光绪帝的皇后，但婚后不受宠爱，夫妻关系不睦。
description.en: Longyu was the Empress of the Guangxu Emperor, but she was not favored after marriage, and their relationship was poor.

description.zh-cn: 瑾妃性情忠厚，与失宠的皇后走得很近，关系较好。
description.en: Consort Jin, being loyal and kind, was close to the out-of-favor Empress and had a good relationship with her.

description.zh-cn: 文廷式曾是珍妃的老师，教其读书，使其颇通文史。
description.en: Wen Tingshi was Consort Zhen's tutor, teaching her literature and history, which made her well-versed in these subjects.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃多次向光绪帝称赞文廷式，促使光绪帝在甲午大考翰詹中将其拔置第一，并擢升其官职。
description.en: Consort Zhen repeatedly praised Wen Tingshi to the Guangxu Emperor, which led the emperor to rank him first in the Hanlin Academy examination and promote him.

description.zh-cn: 甲午战争期间，主战的文廷式与持妥协态度的李鸿章极度不和。
description.en: During the First Sino-Japanese War, the pro-war Wen Tingshi was in extreme disagreement with the compromising Li Hongzhang.

description.zh-cn: 杨崇伊受李鸿章授意，向慈禧参奏，诬陷珍妃干预朝政与觊觎后位，这是导致珍妃第一次获罪降级的重要原因。
description.en: Instigated by Li Hongzhang, Yang Chongyi submitted a memorial to Cixi, falsely accusing Consort Zhen of interfering in politics and coveting the empress's position, which was a major reason for her first punishment and demotion.

description.zh-cn: 因杨崇伊对珍妃的参奏，其兄志锐也受到牵连，被贬为乌里雅苏台参赞大臣。
description.en: Due to Yang Chongyi's accusations against Consort Zhen, her brother Zhirui was also implicated and demoted to Counselor of Uliastai.

description.zh-cn: 因杨崇伊的参奏，文廷式被革职。
description.en: As a result of Yang Chongyi's accusations, Wen Tingshi was dismissed from his post.

description.zh-cn: 据《国闻备乘》记载，珍妃收受鲁伯阳四万金贿赂后，向光绪帝进言，使其被任命为上海道。此事成为她被指控卖官的证据之一。
description.en: According to 'Guowen Beicheng', after accepting a bribe of 40,000 taels of gold from Lu Boyang, Consort Zhen recommended him to the Guangxu Emperor, leading to his appointment as Shanghai Daotai. This incident became part of the evidence used to accuse her of selling official posts.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃出身于满洲镶红旗他他拉氏。
description.en: Consort Zhen was from the Tatara clan of the Manchu Bordered Red Banner.
